mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(user_id, b_title, b_category, b_content, b_lang, b_comment_active) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{b_title}, #{b_category}, #{b_content}, #{b_lang}, #{b_comment_active})
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM board WHERE b_category = COALESCE(#{category}, b_category)
SELECT * FROM board WHERE b_category = COALESCE(#{category}, b_category) ORDER BY b_no DESC LIMIT #{offset}, 20

SELECT * FROM board WHERE b_no LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR b_content LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR b_title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR user_id LIKE concat('%' #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY b_no ASC LIMIT #{offset}, 20
